column4: helloa, i'm in a bit hurry, so instead of the mystical world of google and forums, I though that maybe someone has a quick solution here.. I have a laptop and external monitor attached to it. I'm having a bit trouble with the ATI's proprietary drivers and getting the resolution right for my monitor (1680x1050). I don't need the picture in my laptop screen, only the monitor..  (I have ubuntu8.04)
you may want to come back when you are in less of a hurry, thats not a 30 second fix
ok, but I'm willing to take some info as a private message if possible :)
no need, just come back when you have more time
